sources.title: 1933 Die Blonde Christl ( Karin Hardt)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1933. Die blonde Christl.  U.a mit Joe Stöckel und Karin Hardt

metadata.Plot: An escapist story, from a popular Heimat writer, about a girl who falls in love with a small town violin maker, to take viewers' minds off the Depression there are Bavarian songs and scenes of skiing and hunting in the Alps.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Dalman, Ludwig Ganghofer, Joe Stöckel
metadata.Actors: Karin Hardt, Theodor Loos, Rolf von Goth
